Coffee Hour with Superintendent Dr. Salah

div.p: HVS Superintendent Dr. Paul Salah is hosting a virtual coffee hour on Wednesday, April 22 from 1 p.m. to 2 p.m. Dr. Salah will discuss the district’s learn at home plan, legislative issues related to schools, our bond projects and general school district operations. You are invited to participate by tuning into the livestream at the following link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=drxjKWMKVak&feature=youtu.be
The comment feature will be activated on the livestream allowing parents to ask questions or make a comment.

div.div: COVID-19 Update: Continuity of Learning Plan submitted to ISD

div.p: As the first week of our Learn at Home Plan (Phase 3) draws to a close, I want to acknowledge your support and patience as we grow and develop our capacity to manage in the face of the COVID-19 pandemic.

a.aria-label: COVID-19 Update: Continuity of Learning Plan submitted to ISD

div.div: COVID-19 Update: Phase III Learning Plan begins April 13

div.p: Each week during our mandatory closure, I’ve worked to keep you updated on the latest developments in key areas of our school district operations. Before I provide you with those updates, however, I want to wish all of you a Happy Easter or Passover.
